name: Bicycle Express
reviews: During covid 19 lockdown these guys ran a safe and super helpful operation. They helped me get set up with a bike and were smart, honest, and all around...

name: The Blue Stone
reviews: Hit the spot and then some. Good food and great ambiance. I look forward to more meals someday.

name: Embodied
reviews: Embodied offers a full range of classes and outstanding teachers. It offers a mix of styles and convenient class times, and they also offer two+ hour yoga...
Beautiful studio, great teachers! Lots of different class options, levels, and styles. Drop-in $15/$12 students & seniors.
Amazing and welcoming studio with great teachers. They also provide free mats, props and filtered water. Best yoga in Montpelier!

name: Country Club of Vermont
reviews: This golf course is Vermont at its finest. The layout is spectacular, cut out from rolling hills and dense forests, with breathtaking views of The Green...

name: Snap Fitness Berlin
reviews: Great affordable gym.  Have many Les Mills classes, free weights, and cardio equipment.  Open 24/7 for people with weird work schedules.
The biggest snap fitness Ive seen! Even have showers & dance room. I was surprise to see a bigger snap location in such a small town. But I loved it!

reviews: Great martial arts instruction. The beginning classes are held Tuesday nights at 6:15 p.m. with advanced classes (by invitation only) on Thursday nights.

name: First In Fitness
reviews: This facility will suffice your central vermont workout needs. It's costly but a godsend in the dead of winter in this region.
